#summary How to build the client and the broker with the Makefile

The handy {{{Makefile}}} contains some targets to get you up and running:

 = {{{all}}} =

Compiles the {{{.erl}}}s to {{{.beam}}}s

 = {{{clean}}} =

Delete all compiled files

 = {{{boot}}} =

Compiles the broker's {{{.beam}}}s into a {{{.boot}}} that can be specified when you invoke erlang, to run the broker

 = {{{run}}} =

Runs the broker by specifying the {{{.boot}}} when starting the vm

 = {{{dist}}} =

Prepeare an tar/gz'd release suitable for distributing the broker, according to the [http://erlang.org/doc/design_principles/release_structure.html erlang way]
